last_episode_to_air.name: Reinventing the House
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the final episode, battles break out over the future of the House.

name: Inside the Commons
overview: A documentary series which shows the work done by Members of Parliament, both behind the scenes and in public proceedings in the House of Commons.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Michael Cockerell presents a series filmed over the course of a year with unparalleled access to the House of Commons.

episodes.name: Lifting the Lid
episodes.overview: A look at the heart of British democracy in the run up to the 2015 general election.

episodes.name: Upstairs, Downstairs
episodes.overview: Michael Cockerell examines what goes on backstage at the state opening of parliament.

episodes.name: Party Games
episodes.overview: Is the traditional three-party system falling apart at the seams?

episodes.name: Reinventing the House
episodes.overview: In the final episode, battles break out over the future of the House.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Michael Cockerell presents a series filmed over the course of a year with unparalleled access to the House of Commons.
